languages.text: "Лексмеханики также отмечают, что ваши успехи в области основания и развития колоний создают многообещающий фундамент для дальнейшей экспансии".

traits.locale_text: "Лексмеханики также отмечают, что ваши успехи в области основания и развития колоний создают многообещающий фундамент для дальнейшей экспансии".

languages.text: "The Lexmechanics also note that your successes in establishing and developing colonies serve as a promising foundation for further expansion."
languages.original_text: "Лексмеханики также отмечают, что ваши успехи в области основания и развития колоний создают многообещающий фундамент для дальнейшей экспансии".

traits.locale_text: "The Lexmechanics also note that your feats in founding and developing colonies serve as a promising foundation for further expansion."
"The Lexmechanics also note that your feats in founding and developing colonies serve as a promising foundation for further expansion."
"The Lexmechanics also note that your successes in establishing and developing colonies serve as a promising foundation for further expansion."
"The Lexmechanics also note that your successes in establishing and developing colonies serve as a promising foundation for further expansion."
"The Lexmechanics also note that your successes in establishing and developing colonies serve as a promising foundation for further expansion."

languages.text: 「法技術者はまた、ロード・キャプテンがコロニーの設立と開発に成功すれば、さらなる領地拡大のための末頼もしい基板となる、とも述べています」
languages.original_text: "The Lexmechanics also note that your successes in establishing and developing colonies serve as a promising foundation for further expansion."

traits.locale_text: 「法技術者はまた、ロード・キャプテンがコロニーの設立と開発に成功すれば、さらなる領地拡大のための末頼もしい基板となる、とも述べています」

languages.text: “思律机僧还表示，您一手建立发展的众多殖民地，将会为您未来的扩张奠定坚实的基础。”
languages.original_text: "The Lexmechanics also note that your successes in establishing and developing colonies serve as a promising foundation for further expansion."

traits.locale_text: “法律技工还表示，您一手建立发展的众多殖民地，将会为您未来的扩张奠定坚实的基础。”

languages.text: «Los lexmecánicos también mencionan que sus éxitos a la hora de fundar y desarrollar colonias son una base prometedora para una mayor expansión».
languages.original_text: "The Lexmechanics also note that your successes in establishing and developing colonies serve as a promising foundation for further expansion."

traits.locale_text: «Los lexmecánicos también mencionan que sus éxitos a la hora de fundar y desarrollar colonias son una base prometedora para una mayor expansión».

languages.text: « Au vu de vos récents succès dans l'établissement et le développement de colonies, les lexmécaniciens ont également noté que l'extension de votre domaine ne devrait pas être un problème. »
languages.original_text: "The Lexmechanics also note that your successes in establishing and developing colonies serve as a promising foundation for further expansion."

traits.locale_text: « Au vu de vos récents succès dans l'établissement et le développement de colonies, les lexmécaniciens ont également noté que l'extension de votre domaine ne devrait pas être un problème. »

languages.text: "Die Lexmechanici merken zudem an, dass Euer Erfolg bei der Gründung und Entwicklung von Kolonien eine vielversprechende Basis für weitere Expansion darstellt."
languages.original_text: "The Lexmechanics also note that your successes in establishing and developing colonies serve as a promising foundation for further expansion."

traits.locale_text: "Die Lexmechanici merken zudem an, dass Euer Erfolg bei der Gründung und Entwicklung von Kolonien eine vielversprechende Basis für weitere Expansion darstellt."

languages.text: "Lexmekanikler ayrıca koloni kurma ve geliştirmedeki başarılarınızın, ilave genişleme çabaları için umut verici bir temel oluşturduğuna dikkat çekiyor."
languages.original_text: "The Lexmechanics also note that your successes in establishing and developing colonies serve as a promising foundation for further expansion."

traits.locale_text: "Lexmekanikler ayrıca koloni kurma ve geliştirmedeki başarılarınızın, ilave genişleme için umut verici bir temel oluşturduğuna dikkat çekiyor."
